item.title: Bitcoin on C-SPAN
item.description:
Bitcoin on C-SPAN

A caller mentions Bitcoin on a C-SPAN segment about US debt

item.title: 3 Signs You Might Just Be A Super Entrepreneur
item.description:
3 Signs You Might Just Be A Super Entrepreneur

You may just be an entrepreneur like Tony Stark if you exhibit the signs mentioned in this article. As you're watching the scene in Ironman 3, where Jarvis, the holographic computer, outfits him with a new and improved version of his ultra-high tech suit of armor, it dawns on you that being an entrepreneur is a great career path.

item.title: Cumberland Mining Has 'Won Big Bitcoin Auctions' - Bitcoinist.net
item.description:
Cumberland Mining Has 'Won Big Bitcoin Auctions' - Bitcoinist.net

On May 23rd, TradeBlock announced that it is servicing an interesting trading company called Cumberland Mining. TradeBlock says it will be enabling an "order management system and execution tool set" for the enterprise. Cumberland Mining is associated with the principal trading group DRW Holdings LLC.

item.title: SWIFT Introduces New Centralized Cyber Security Resources
item.description:
SWIFT Introduces New Centralized Cyber Security Resources

After all of the negative attention the SWIFT team had to deal with over the past few months, it looks like they have finally taken the right decision by doubling down on security. New security resources have been developed, which should help prevent these fraudulent attacks from happening in the first place.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; Let's Get Some Action! - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; Let's Get Some Action! - NEWSBTC

Here are the levels to watch in today's bitcoin price in order to draw a profit from any volatility across the European session. In yesterday's analysis, we commented on the relatively slow week we had seen in the bitcoin price last week, and noted that - in response to the little bit of volatility we saw over the weekend - we expected some decent momentum to come our way during Monday's session.

item.title: Kill Monsters, Get Bitcoin: Minecraft Server Releases Version 2.0, Opens Up "Satoshi Town"
item.description:
Kill Monsters, Get Bitcoin: Minecraft Server Releases Version 2.0, Opens Up "Satoshi Town"

BitQuest, a Minecraft server that uses a Bitcoin denominated monetary system for in-game transactions, has just entered version 2.0. The server's website says: "The currency on this server are the Bits. A bit is a fraction of a Bitcoin (1/1000000) that you can obtain by killing monsters, trading with users or transferring [sic] from an outside wallet.

item.title: Bitcoin Gains Favor With Modern Day 'Gold Bugs' Seeking Financial Security
item.description:
Bitcoin Gains Favor With Modern Day 'Gold Bugs' Seeking Financial Security

Kanishka Sukumar, a 24-year-old consultant in midtown Manhattan, holds about a third of his wealth in bitcoin. He represents a new generation of "gold bugs" who question the stability of paper currency or seek better ways to protect savings, according to The Wall Street Journal.

item.title: Cryptocurrency Market for Bitcoin Worth $19.48 Billion in 2016
item.description:
Cryptocurrency Market for Bitcoin Worth $19.48 Billion in 2016

Bitcoin remains the clear market leader in the world of cryptocurrency, although several competitors have come to fruition in the past few years When looking at the cryptocurrency market as a whole, this movement is becoming quite popular and keeps increasing in value.

item.title: Russia Prime Minister: DAO is an 'Interesting Challenge' for Law
item.description:
Russia Prime Minister: DAO is an 'Interesting Challenge' for Law

At the International Legal Forum, which took its place May 18-21, in St. Petersburg, Russia, Russian prime minister Dmitriy Medvedev gave a short speech to legal experts on the Internet of Things, blockchain technology, and DAOs. Although his rhetoric was calm, soft and simple, many Russian cryptocurrency users saw his statements as an omen of a future clampdown.
